verses.text: \w Have|strong="H1732"\w* mercy \w on|strong="H5329"\w* me, God, according \w to|strong="H1732"\w* \w your|strong="H1732"\w* loving kindness. According \w to|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* multitude \w of|strong="H4210"\w* \w your|strong="H1732"\w* tender mercies, blot out \w my|strong="H1732"\w* transgressions.
Wash me thoroughly \w from|strong="H5030"\w* my iniquity. Cleanse me \w from|strong="H5030"\w* my sin.

\w For|strong="H2617"\w* \w I|strong="H6588"\w* know \w my|strong="H7230"\w* \w transgressions|strong="H6588"\w*. \w My|strong="H7230"\w* \w sin|strong="H6588"\w* \w is|strong="H2617"\w* constantly before \w me|strong="H2603"\w*.

Against \w you|strong="H7235"\w*, \w and|strong="H2403"\w* \w you|strong="H7235"\w* \w only|strong="H7235"\w*, \w I|strong="H5771"\w* \w have|strong="H5771"\w* \w sinned|strong="H2403"\w*, \w and|strong="H2403"\w* done \w that|strong="H2403"\w* \w which|strong="H2403"\w* \w is|strong="H5771"\w* \w evil|strong="H5771"\w* \w in|strong="H7235"\w* \w your|strong="H7235"\w* sight, \w so|strong="H7235"\w* \w you|strong="H7235"\w* may \w be|strong="H5771"\w* proved right \w when|strong="H7235"\w* \w you|strong="H7235"\w* speak, \w and|strong="H2403"\w* justified \w when|strong="H7235"\w* \w you|strong="H7235"\w* judge.
Behold, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* was born \w in|strong="H3045"\w* iniquity. \w My|strong="H3045"\w* mother conceived \w me|strong="H5048"\w* \w in|strong="H3045"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*.

Behold, \w you|strong="H6213"\w* desire truth \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* inward parts. \w You|strong="H6213"\w* teach \w me|strong="H6213"\w* wisdom \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* inmost place.

Purify me \w with|strong="H5771"\w* hyssop, \w and|strong="H5771"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H5771"\w* \w be|strong="H5771"\w* clean. Wash me, \w and|strong="H5771"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H5771"\w* \w be|strong="H5771"\w* whiter than snow.

Let \w me|strong="H3045"\w* hear joy \w and|strong="H2451"\w* gladness, \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* bones which \w you|strong="H3045"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* broken may rejoice.
Hide \w your|strong="H3526"\w* face \w from|strong="H2398"\w* my \w sins|strong="H2398"\w*, \w and|strong="H2398"\w* blot out \w all|strong="H2398"\w* \w of|strong="H2891"\w* my iniquities.

Create \w in|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H8085"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* clean \w heart|strong="H8085"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God. Renew \w a|strong="H3068"\w* right spirit within \w me|strong="H8085"\w*.

Don’t throw \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* don’t take \w your|strong="H3605"\w* Holy Spirit \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w Restore|strong="H2318"\w* \w to|strong="H3820"\w* \w me|strong="H3559"\w* \w the|strong="H3559"\w* joy \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w your|strong="H3559"\w* salvation. Uphold \w me|strong="H3559"\w* \w with|strong="H3820"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* willing \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3947"\w* \w I|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H7307"\w* teach transgressors \w your|strong="H3947"\w* ways. Sinners \w will|strong="H7307"\w* \w be|strong="H7307"\w* converted \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w Deliver|strong="H7725"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* guilt \w of|strong="H7307"\w* bloodshed, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w the|strong="H7725"\w* God \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w*. \w My|strong="H7725"\w* tongue \w will|strong="H7307"\w* sing aloud \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* righteousness.
Lord, open \w my|strong="H7725"\w* lips. \w My|strong="H7725"\w* mouth \w will|strong="H7725"\w* declare \w your|strong="H7725"\w* praise.

\w For|strong="H7442"\w* \w you|strong="H5337"\w* don’t delight \w in|strong="H8668"\w* sacrifice, \w or|strong="H1818"\w* else \w I|strong="H6666"\w* would give \w it|strong="H6666"\w*. \w You|strong="H5337"\w* \w have|strong="H5337"\w* no pleasure \w in|strong="H8668"\w* burnt offering.

\w The|strong="H5046"\w* sacrifices \w of|strong="H6310"\w* God \w are|strong="H8193"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* broken spirit. \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w you|strong="H5046"\w* \w will|strong="H6310"\w* \w not|strong="H6605"\w* despise \w a|strong="H3068"\w* broken \w and|strong="H6310"\w* contrite \w heart|strong="H8193"\w*.
Do well \w in|strong="H2654"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* good \w pleasure|strong="H7521"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* Zion. Build \w the|strong="H3588"\w* walls \w of|strong="H2077"\w* Jerusalem.

\w Then|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* delight \w in|strong="H7665"\w* \w the|strong="H7665"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* righteousness, \w in|strong="H7665"\w* \w burnt|strong="H3820"\w* \w offerings|strong="H2077"\w* \w and|strong="H2077"\w* \w in|strong="H7665"\w* whole \w burnt|strong="H3820"\w* \w offerings|strong="H2077"\w*. \w Then|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* \w offer|strong="H2077"\w* bulls \w on|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* altar.
